text: Avanē, granthadavarallina dhikkārigaḷannu prathama uccāṭaneya vēḷe avara manegaḷinda horaḍisidavanu. Avaru horaḍuvarendu nīvendū bhāvisiralilla. Atta avaru, tam'ma kōṭegaḷu tam'mannu allāhaninda rakṣisaballavendu bhāvisi koṇḍiddaru. Ādare allāhanu avarendū ūhisillada kaḍeyinda avara baḷige bandanu – mattu avara manas'sugaḷalli bhītiyannu bittidanu. (Idara phalavāgi) avaru svataḥ tam'ma kaigaḷinda tam'ma nivāsagaḷannu keḍavi hāka toḍagidaru. Viśvāsigaḷa kaigaḷindalū (adannē māḍisalāyitu). Dr̥ṣṭiyuḷḷavarē, pāṭha kaliyiri
